data.description:
Seller Just  Reduced the Price by $25,000 and... is offering  The Buyer up to $15,000 in Concessions! Bring Your Buyer to take a look! Seller is still working on the house! Inside and Outside Paint and More... Quick Close! Please No Low Offers New Price will reflect the work the  Seller is doing on the house! Professional Pictures Coming Soon! Buyer and Buyer Agent to Verify All Information!
For any questions please call Listing Broker!
